item.title: Hockey ladies beat CSM for first time in 12 years
item.author: Maria Parkes,
item.description: It may have been 09:00 on a cold, rainy Saturday morning but the spectators for the ladies hockey were in for a treat. Laura’s goal from an early short corner gave Royal School of Mines a 1-0 lead and set the pace for the rest of the game. Camborne School of Mines reacted quickly with a good through …
